## SettingTab class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export abstract class SettingTab 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`app`](SettingTab.app.md) |  | [`App`](App.md) | Reference to the app instance. |
|  [`containerEl`](SettingTab.containerEl.md) |  | <code>HTMLElement</code> | Outermost HTML element on the setting tab. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [`display()`](SettingTab.display.md) | <code>abstract</code> | Called when the settings tab should be rendered. |
|  [`hide()`](SettingTab.hide.md) |  | Hides the contents of the setting tab. Any registered components should be unloaded when the view is hidden. Override this if you need to perform additional cleanup. |
